item.description:
Hey everyone!

Even though it was a small group we had a blast last week at Northeastern so we are going to rock it out again here on this side of the river. There's parking on Forsyth, Parker, and Hemenway or (if you are lucky) along Huntington Ave. We'll meet up right in the Marino Center, its a can't miss building with a glass facade and an Au Bon Pain and Bolocco downstairs.

There's a ton of seating in an open area once you walk in. We'll be there. If you are going to be late though please give a ring to the number listed as we'll probably move to a nicer local on campus depending how many people we get.

Don't worry though, there's a UNOs right down the block for our usual after improv dinner and dessert and there are some other options too if we feel adventurous.


Any questions? Let me know. I hope you are all doing great!!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a wacky face on as the norm!
item.name: Improv Northeastern Stylin Part II
